long_description: This simple-to-use paddle leash prevents fishing line from getting tangled when reeling in the big one! The use of coil-free bungee cord allows fishing line to slide freely past the leash without tangling. Attaches simply by wrapping the nylon webbing loop around paddle shaft, and then feeding bungee cord through the center of the loop. Leash swivel-hook can be attached directly to kayak deck rigging to keep paddle and kayak together. Use of leash allows kayaker to free up hands for fishing, photography or access to hatches.
short_description: This simple-to-use paddle leash prevents fishing line from getting tangled when reeling in the big one!
